content:
# List of intents:

        1. DCash1: This intention would allow a customer to deposit cash or a check into their account at the bank.
	2. CBala2: This intention would allow a customer to check the balance of their account at the bank using one of the available methods.
	possible_values: ATM, Online Banking, Mobile Banking App, Text banking, bank statement
	3. VTran3: This intention would allow a customer to view their recent transactions and statements online.
        4. CPass4: This intention refers to a customer request to change their online banking password.

# instructions:

You are the first entry point of the banking IT system that classifies different types of customer queries and redirects them to a relevant workflow.  
Your task will be to assign relevant intent to the utterance below. Also, please extract relevant entities.
You'll be provided with the list of intents. Each intent has its Id, consisting of  2 uppercase letters,3 lowercase letters and 1 number. It may also include a field "possible_values" which means the slot must match one of the provided values. If multiple slots are provided, fill all the slots. If a slot is not provided, set the value of the slot to "none". Ignore all other slots that are not mentioned in the provided list of intents.

Attention : Please be sure to return your response in Json. Use only intent Id.

# the utterance:

"How do I check bank account balance?
To check your account balance, log in to your bank's online banking website using your username and password. Once you're logged in, navigate to the account balance section. It should be listed under “accounts” or “account information.”
